articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Birthday Spread to Woman Centenarian
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Birthday Spread to Woman Centenarian
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un sent a birthday spread to Ri Ok San, a centenarian residing in Upho-ri, Phungso County, Ryanggang Province.
					She lived in sorrow as a stateless national since she was born. It was only after the liberation of the country that she could lead a worthy life.
					
					She has done farm work even after her retirement with a single mind to repay for the benevolent care of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					She has balanced diet and lives optimistically.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from KFA Chairman
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from KFA Chairman
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a letter from Alejandro Cao de Benos, chairman of the Korean Friendship Association, on Jan. 28.
					The letter said:
					
					The most respected Your Excellency Kim Jong Un,
					
					The International Preparatory Committee for Commemorating the Centenary of Birth of the great leader President Kim Il Sung and the Korean Friendship Association organized an Internet international seminar on the theme of "The great leader Kim Jong Il will always be with us" from December 24, Juche 100 (2011), to inform the whole world of the immortal life and revolutionary activities of the great leader Kim Jong Il and his devoted service made to translate into reality the desire of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					More than 26.5 million people in the world have so far had access to photos on the revolutionary feats of the great leader Kim Jong Il and songs and written speeches praising his exploits.
					
					The participants in the seminar were unanimous in expressing the desire to see a statue of the great leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill in Pyongyang where the statue of the great President Kim Il Sung is standing.
					
					The image of Your Excellency Kim Jong Un visiting the Mangyongdae Revolutionary School gave a great encouragement to us struggling to defend and glorify the homeland of Juche.
					
					We wish you good health.
					
					Long live Your Excellency General Kim Jong Un!

articles.title: Journalist Peace Prize for 2012 Awarded to Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Journalist Peace Prize for 2012 Awarded to Kim Jong Un
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- The National Press Club of Nepal registered the dear respected Kim Jong Un as its honorary member. And the Club and its Study and Research Forum of Songun Politics awarded a Journalist Peace Prize for 2012 to him.
					A ceremony of conveying the prize and its diploma took place on Feb. 6.
					
					Present there were officials of the government, political parties and organizations and popular masses of Nepal. Among them were the minister of State of Information and Communications, the general secretary of the C.C., Nepal Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist) who doubles as chairman of the Nepalese national preparatory committee to commemorate the 70th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il, and the chairman of the Study and Research Forum of Songun Politics of the National Press Club.
					
					Present on invitation were the DPRK ambassador to Nepal and his embassy officials.
					
					The prize and diploma were handed over to the DPRK ambassador.
					
					Ram K. Karmacharya, chairman of the Study and Research Forum of Songun Politics, said that it is unanimous will and highest honor of progressive media persons of Nepal and the rest of the world to register Kim Jong Un as honorary member of the National Press Club of Nepal and award the prize to him on the Day of the Shining Star.

articles.title: Joint Presidium of Pomminryon Meets
articles.content:
Joint Presidium of Pomminryon Meets
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- The 13th meeting of the Joint Presidium of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) was held by way of facsimile among the north and the south and overseas headquarters Saturday.
					The meeting discussed the action orientation of Pomminryon to make a breakthrough for independent reunification this year by putting spurs on the reunification movement through firm unity of all compatriots in the north and the south and abroad under the banner of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					A report was made at the meeting.
					
					The report censured the south Korean conservative authorities for having totally denied the inter-Korean declarations and escalated confrontation with fellow countrymen and war moves since they took office and thus driving the north-south relations to collapse.
					
					It noted that Pomminryon made devoted efforts in the van of Koreans for national harmony and independent reunification without any vacillation despite manifold difficulties and trials last year.
					
					It set forth the tasks and ways for Pomminryon to hold higher the slogan "Let all the compatriots open the gates of national reunification full of fresh confidence!" this year.
					
					A joint resolution was adopted at the meeting.
					
					Expressing the will to invariably hold high the banner of the historic June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, the resolution said:
					
					We will take the lead in successfully holding joint national events with attendance of people of broad strata from the north and the south and overseas to mark the 12th anniversary of the historic June 15 joint declaration and the 5th anniversary of the October 4 declaration and thus let the atmosphere of implementing the inter-Korean declarations and achieving national reconciliation and unity prevail over the whole of Korea.
					
					Pomminryon will resolutely foil the war and confrontation moves of the bellicose forces at home and abroad. 
					
					For the present, it will wage vigorous struggle to check Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises the bellicose forces of south Korea are going to finally stage with the U.S.
					
					On the other hand, it will resolutely reject all sorts of anti-reunification conceptions on confrontation such as "adherence to principles" and "confrontation between systems" and military nexus with outsiders.
					
					Pomminryon, together with other organizations and personages of different circles, will get the U.S. troops, a main stumbling block to peace and a root cause of evils, withdrawn from south Korea and surely force them to pay for the crimes committed against Koreans historically.
					
					This year it will strive on its initiative to achieve the great unity of broad forces aspiring after progressive and democratic reforms.
					
					We will join hands with all political parties, organizations and personages desirous of implementation of the inter-Korean declarations, peace and reunification, social progress and democracy.
					
					We will work hard to strengthen concerted action with broad people of different strata and ensure firm solidarity with All-Korean Committee for Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration and, for the present, take the lead in the struggle to remove the "May 24 steps" and activate visits and contacts between the north and the south.
					
					Pomminryon will hold with splendor a "meeting of Koreans from the north and the south and abroad for independence and great unity of the nation" every year with August 15 of this year as a staring point and thus consolidate the three-party solidarity, which has been protected in blood for over the past two decades, and remarkably strengthen its might and inspiringly encourage all compatriots to the movement for national reunification.

articles.title: Great National Unity Called for
articles.content:
Great National Unity Called for
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- Regional organizations under the Overseas Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration on Feb. 5 made public statements in support of the appeal to all Koreans at home and abroad issued by the North Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration 
					The European regional committee in its statement said that whoever feels painful of the divided country should take part in the march for national independence and peaceful reunification.
					
					All the patriotic forces should unite and launch a vigorous struggle to frustrate the war moves of the Lee Myung Bak group, sycophantic and traitorous group opposed to reunification, it added. 
					
					The Canada regional committee in its statement said that the appeal indicates the way for the national reunification movement of Koreans in the north, south and overseas. 
					
					It declared that it would positively stage the struggle for great national unity and independent reunification of the country shoulder to shoulder with all Koreans at home and abroad. 
					
					The U.S. central regional committee in its statement expressed the will to strive to promote national reconciliation and unity and bring about a decisive turn in achieving national reunification. 
					
					The statement declared that it would take part in every event for reunification common to the nation to be held on the 12th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration and the 5th anniversary of the October 4 declaration. 
					
					It will hold more brisk meetings and solidarity actions among overseas Koreans' reunification movement organizations across the world, the statement stressed.

articles.title: Visiting Koreans from Japan Pay Homage to Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Visiting Koreans from Japan Pay Homage to Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- Koreans from Japan visited the statue of President Kim Il Sung on Ryongnam Hill on Saturday to pay homage to him.
					They are a delegation of Koreans in Japan for commemorating the Day of the Shining Star, a delegation of officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan and a delegation of officials of the Korean Youth League in Japan. 
					
					The visitors laid bouquets before the statue carrying their unbounded reverence for the President and made deep bows to it.

articles.title: Arrivals
articles.content:
Arrivals
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- Delegations of overseas Koreans arrived here on Saturday.
					They included a delegation of the Koreans in Japan for commemorating the Day of the Shining Star led by Pae Ik Ju, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), a delegation of officials of Chongryon led by Kim Hong Chol, department director of its Central Standing Committee, a delegation of officials of the Korean Youth League in Japan led by Kim Cha Dol, chairman of its Central Standing Committee, a delegation of the Federation of Koreans in U.S. led by its Secretary General Kim Hyon Hwan, delegate Han Sung Su, vice-chairman of the Federation of Koreans in Australia, Choe Kon Guk, a Korean resident in Germany, and Kim Myong Ju, a Korean resident in Netherlands.

articles.title: New Documentary Screened in DPRK
articles.content:
New Documentary Screened in DPRK
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- Korean documentary film "With Desire of the Leader" was screened at the People's Palace of Culture on Saturday on the occasion of the significant Day of the Shining Star.
					Among the audience were Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim and other senior party and state officials and officials of ministries and national institutions.
					
					The film deals with the facts that leader Kim Jong Il made an endless journey of patriotic devoted service to realize the desire of President Kim Il Sung for building a thriving nation.
					
					It tells about the undying leadership feats of the peerlessly great man, who put the dignity and strength of Songun Korea on the highest level with his iron will and superhuman energies while instilling into the mind of the army and people the firm faith that the President is always with us.
					
					Through the film its viewers hardened their belief that Kim Jong Il is the peerlessly illustrious Songun commander and patriot and benevolent father who had spent all his life on the train of field guidance for the people's happiness, enduring his fatigue.

articles.title: Letters Carved on Rocks in DPRK Praise Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Letters Carved on Rocks in DPRK Praise Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- Letters "Peerless Patriot General Kim Jong Il" were carved on a rock in Mt. Sokda, Jungsan County on the significant Day of the Shining Star.
					The letters carved by DPRK servicepersons and people in all annals lauding Kim Jong Il's greatness show their iron will to hold him in high esteem forever and hand down his revolutionary feats for all ages.
					
					During the great anti-Japanese war, anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters carved on trees such letters as "heir to General Kim Il Sung", "son of 20 million", "Paektu star" and  "The Shining Star, symbol of future" reminding the readers of the personality of Kim Jong Il as a great man born of heaven.
					
					Letters "Jong Il Peak" were carved on the peak on Mt. Paektu in Nov. 1988 while "Honor of Korea and Pride of Nation Kim Jong Il" and "lodestar of Juche Kim Jong Il" on Oson Peak of Inner Kumgang and Mangsu Peak of outer-Kumgang of Mt. Kumgang on the occasion of the 45th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					Letters carved on a rock of Ryanggak Peak of Mt. Kuwol in Dec. 1998 spelled out "Sun of 21st century General Kim Jong Il".
					
					Rocks in Mts. Myohyang and Chilbo and Phyongji-ri of Maengsan County and Pansok-ri of Cholwon County bear letters reading "Iron-willed commander Kim Jong Il", "Illustrious commander General        Kim Jong Il", "Legendary hero General Kim Jong Il", "Peerlessly illustrious commander General Kim Jong Il".
					
					Korean people carved letters "Illustrious commander General Kim Jong Il" and "Long live Great Songun Politics!" in the rocks of Pari Peak in the area of Sujong Peak of Mt. Kumgang and Mae Peak of Mt. Suyang in Haeju city reflecting the DPRK army and people's loyalty to him.
					
					The immortal revolutionary hymn "Song of General Kim Jong Il" carved in a rock of Tokgol in Mt. Chilbo or Mt. Kumgang of North Hamgyong Province, hands down his feats for all ages.

articles.title: Stamps Issued on Day of Shining Star
articles.content:
Stamps Issued on Day of Shining Star
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- The Korean National Stamp Publishing Bureau issued stamps in commemoration of the Day of Shining Star (February 16), birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il. They are one kind of sheet-type stamp, one kind of sheetlet-type stamp and one kind of single-type stamp.
					In the upper parts of the stamps are letters reading "In commemoration of birth of the great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il".
					
					The sheet-type stamp has the image of a smiling Kim Jong Il standing with Mt. Paektu, the sacred mountain of revolution, in the background.
					
					The sheetlet-type stamp shows the revolutionary activities of Kim Jong Il who made the forced march of field guidance all his life to powerfully arouse the servicepersons and people to building a thriving nation.
					
					The single-type stamp depicts beautiful Kimjongilia in full bloom.

articles.title: KCNA Dismisses Rubbish Told by S. Korean Paper
articles.content:
KCNA Dismisses Rubbish in S. Korean Paper
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- The south Korean reptile paper Chosun Ilbo recently let loose a spate of invectives about the local performance tour made by the Unhasu Orchestra, the DPRK's renowned art troupe.
					Having no elementary understanding of the mass-based art, this paper echoed what was aired by Radio Free Asia engaged in the anti-DPRK smear propaganda. It claimed that "the performance was not received well by audience" and "it brought them burden rather than pleasure".
					
					This was wicked elements' trumpeting aimed at doing harm to the single-minded unity of the party and people.
					
					How can such human scum understand the people of the DPRK and its arts?
					
					Inspired by songs, the Korean people's 80 odd year-long just revolutionary struggle started, advanced and won victories. 
					
					The Korean revolution and people held aloft the banner of "Let's always be cheerful although our path is thorny!", the banner of confidence and optimism, during the Arduous March, the forced march.
					
					In this glorious course, songs and arts in the DPRK have served as valuable ideological and moral pabulum for the people making revolution that a large quantity of food can hardly substitute.
					
					Even after the loss of the father whom the Korean people deeply trusted and followed, they drew a thousand-fold strength and courage from the songs presented by the orchestra after the start of the advance in the new year. It is setting the hearts of people afire with reverence for the leader in various parts of the country. Its performances evoked a lively response among audience as they helped consolidate the unity between the leader and the people and aroused among them ardent longing for him. 
					
					The service personnel and people of the DPRK joined the orchestra in singing songs in tears and rose up, inspired by them. What the above-said media asserted is nothing but a shriek of despair made by those taken aback by the might of the arts, the hot wind raised by the orchestra more powerful than a nuclear bomb. 
					
					The reptile paper, a mixture of the American style and Japanese way of life, can never understand the true character and value of the DPRK's arts.
					
					They were so displeased with its local performance tour that they claimed it was unprofitable, the absurd assertion of a merchant. This suffices to guess their level of knowledge about arts.
					
					The smear campaign made by Chosun Ilbo and Radio Free Asia was manipulated by the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors and the Intelligence Service.
					
					No matter how desperately the Lee's group work to hurt the single-minded unity of the DPRK, it is as foolish an act as running its head against a wall.
					
					Miserable, indeed, is the position of the Lee's group keen to prolong its remaining days as politicians through escalated confrontation with compatriots.

articles.title: Nothing Is More Genuine and Touching than Tears Shed by Korean People: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Nothing Is More Genuine and Strong than Tears Shed by Korean People: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- Nothing is more genuine and strong than the tears shed by the Korean people when grieving over the passing of leader Kim Jong Il who dedicated himself to the country and its people all his life, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a political essay.
					It goes on:
					
					Witnessing and experiencing the whole life of Kim Jong Il, the Korean people more keenly realized what a great man they have held in high esteem as their leader and what a happy and worthwhile life they have led. 
					
					He was born in a cold log cabin in forest of Mt. Paektu, not a cradle. From that day he suffered from cold and hunger, nostalgic of his homeland. He spent his childhood when the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle was at its height. 
					
					Then he underwent difficulties during the period of building a new country, the three year-war and the postwar rehabilitation and construction.
					
					Then followed the 1970s and 1980s when he had to carry out the work to succeed to the revolutionary cause with his ability and will and which witnessed an era of prosperity thanks to the dramatic changes that took place as a result of the speed campaign. 
					
					Then came periods when he was compelled to battle to defend socialism and the whole nation mourned the passing of President Kim Il Sung in profound grief and had to make the Arduous March.
					
					In the subsequent period Kim Jong Il set about on long journeys of Songun and steered the country's stand-off with the U.S. over the nuclear issue and a war minus gunfire. Then he led the country to make a leap forward towards the world level and a drive to push back the frontiers of latest science and technology and so on.
					
					For the Korean people Kim Jong Il was a great man all his life, not merely a great leader or the supreme commander. He served them with pure conscience before considering it as his mission or ideal or obligation to do. 
					
					There was little that he received from the people and there was nothing that was left for himself. 
					
					He always thought of people. Day and night, rainy or snowy day, happy or unpleasant day, people were the uppermost in his mind. 
					
					He bestowed unbounded benevolence upon the people, but he was never content with it. He always took pain to do anything good for them and worked heart and soul for it.
					
					It was the last day of his life that he was advised by doctors to take a rest for healthcare. But he set about a journey for field guidance early in the morning when people were in a deep sleep. He passed away of an unimaginable heart attack. 
					
					The smile of the strong man shines as a banner of victory and will be cherished in the hearts of people as an immortal soul.
					
					His life is not over but just a beginning as his desire is yet to come true and his running train that had stopped has to sound a louder whistle and all the service personnel and people should emerge more powerful and win greater victory as befitting his soldiers and disciples.
					
					We the sons and daughters of Kim Jong Il can not merely weep over the father's boundless love shown for us.    
					
					The life of Kim Jong Il is enshrined in our hearts as a mirror of mind that makes us look back on what we did everyday and every hour and encourages us to go ahead and as blood and soul. 
					
					We are obliged to turn the snowstorm which Kim Jong Il weathered all his life into confetti and build a thriving nation, his life-long desire, so that he may rest in peace at the Kumsusan Memorial Palace. 
					
					Thanks to the march of Juche made by all service personnel and people hand in hand and shoulder to shoulder, Korea of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, a powerful, highly civilized and prosperous country to be envied by the world, will make its appearance.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Holds S. Korean Authorities Chiefly Responsible for Collapse of Inter-Korean Relations
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Holds S. Korean Authorities Chiefly Responsible for Collapse of Inter-Korean Relations
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities are going to stage Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises with the U.S., an indication of their intention to escalate military confrontation with the DPRK.
					Rodong Sinmun Saturday says this in a bylined commentary.
					
					They are chiefly responsible for the tensions on the Korean Peninsula and the collapse of the north-south relations as they are making desperate efforts to do harm to the DPRK, backed by their U.S. master, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					The Lee Myung Bak group's moves to ignite a war of aggression against the DPRK in collusion with its U.S. master clearly prove that it is nothing but a shock brigade and servants for carrying out the U.S. imperialists' policy for aggression and south Korea is a colony of the U.S.
					
					Through the saber-rattling the puppet forces seek to browbeat the DPRK and escape domestic and foreign criticism and denunciation of them. It is ridiculous of the south Korean authorities to try to get rid of crisis through such military racket.
					
					However, if the warmongers at home and abroad dare launch a war, misjudging the DPRK's will for peace, the hateful provokers will never escape merciless punishment.
					
					The U.S. and south Korean authorities had better stop such reckless acts as jumping into fire with faggot on their backs.

articles.title: Joint Meeting of S. Korean Political Parties and Organizations Held
articles.content:
Joint Meeting of S. Korean Political Parties and Organizations Held
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- A joint meeting of all circles for restoring the south-north relations of peace and cooperation in 2012 was held in Seoul on Feb. 8 under the sponsorship of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration.
					Present there were organizations of civic and public, religious and all other circles and lawmakers from the United Progressive Party and other opposition parties.
					
					A written proposal for social agreement for south-north relations of reconciliation and peace in 2012 was adopted at the meeting in the name of the said South Side Committee.
					
					It said that in order to restore the south-north relations it is necessary to defuse the political and military confrontation to achieve national reconciliation, prevent military conflicts to ensure peace and promote the interests and prosperity common to the nation through multi-faceted cooperation and exchange.
					
					The "government" should positively ensure non-governmental cooperation and exchange as an important element for the development of south-north relations as they should not be stopped under any circumstances, it held, urging the "National Assembly" to let the people know about the unreasonableness of the "May 24 step" and commit itself to lift it as its validity was lost, it bars the inter-Korean cooperation and exchange and brings only sufferings to them.
					
					The events common to the nation marking the anniversaries of the publication of the joint declarations will show whether they are implemented or not and in case they take place, they will lead to substantial dialogue for bringing back south-north relations of reconciliation, peace and prosperity, it said.
					
					For this social agreement all circles will have dialogue with those concerned of all organizations, political parties and the authorities, it emphasized.
					
					Lawmakers from opposition parties and officials of all strata including the religious circle made speeches in support of the proposal for social agreement.
					
					The participants in the meeting signed a large suspension poster bearing the proposal, holding in their hands literature titled "Ensure non-governmental exchange", "Lift of May 24 step", "Resume tour of Mt. Kumgang" and "Ensure south-north joint events".

articles.title: Projected U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises under Fire
articles.content:
Projected U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises under Fire
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- The Kinki Regional Council and the Tokai Regional Council under the Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification released statements on Feb. 7 and 8 in protest against the projected joint military exercises of the U.S. and south Korean authorities to invade the DPRK.
					The statements said Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises are nuclear war exercises aimed at invading the north as they are to be involved by huge troops of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces and the south Korean puppet forces and means for preemptive nuclear attack and groups for maritime operations in south Korea and its vicinity.
					
					The statements noted that all the Koreans cannot repress their resentment at such thrice-cursed crimes of the Lee Myung Bak group as rubbing salt into the wounds of the compatriots who are still grieving over the great loss to the nation.
					
					All the Koreans in Japan do not want to see their homeland turning into shambles of a nuclear war, the statements noted, demanding the warlike forces stop at once the above-said drills unanimously denounced and rejected at home and abroad.
					
					The statements expressed will to join in a nationwide movement for lifting public voices calling for defending peace on the Korean Peninsula and implementing the north-south joint declarations, putting spurs to the struggle for peace against war and opening a turning phase for independent reunification.

articles.title: Abrogation of FTA Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Abrogation of FTA Called for in S. Korea
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- Opposition parties and the Headquarters of the All-People Movement for Checking the Conclusion of the south Korea-U.S. Free Trade Agreement in south Korea held a press conference on Wednesday in Seoul demanding  the abrogation of the humiliating FTA.
					At the conference speakers urged all circles to make concerted efforts for the abrogation of the humiliating agreement.
					
					Those who railroaded FTA through the "National Assembly" will not escape a stern punishment at the general election to be held in April, they warned.
					
					They said they would take all measures for the abrogation of the humiliating agreement.
					
					At the end of the conference they handed to the U.S. embassy letters of protest addressed to the U.S. president and Congress.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Intensify Suppression of Progressive Forces
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Intensify Suppression of Progressive Forces
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities arrested Yun Ki Ha, chairman of the measure committee against the suppression by the public security authorities under the Association of Victims of the "Security Law", on charges of the violation of the Law on Feb. 8, according to south Korean Internet newspaper Jaju Minbo.
					This action was taken for the mere reason that he acted for national reunification as a member of the association for promoting the reunification of the Korean nation by the federal formula.
					
					Protesting against this crackdown, the association accused the authorities of seeking to disorganize the body in retaliation against the attempt to set up an incense-burning altar for mourning over the demise of Kim Jong Il, chairman of the National Defence Commission.
					
					Lurking behind this crackdown is a sinister aim to intensify the crackdown upon the progressive forces with the approach of the general election and the presidential election and thus create favorable conditions for the authorities, it said.

articles.title: S. Korea: MBC Unionists' Strike Supported
articles.content:
S. Korea: MBC Unionists' Strike Supported
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- More than 80 civic and public organizations in south Korea jointly held a press conference on February 7 in support of the general strike by the MBC trade union.
					In a press release the organizations expressed full support for the strike which urges the resignation of MBC Manager Kim Jae Chol, a waiting maid of power, and calls for impartial information.
					
					They pointed out that MBC has been reduced to a meaningless entity due to the Lee Myung Bak "government's" control over media for the past four years.
					
					MBC has collapsed since Lee appointed his close associates as its manager and directors, they said.
					
					Such being the case, Kim Jae Chol and other associates have not examined themselves but are running amuck to repress the just strike while threatening the unionists involved in it, they charged.
					
					They held that the only way to save the MBC is to remove the present chief executive and his stooges as early as possible.
					
					They declared that the civic and public organizations would actively join the trade union's righteous strike and struggle to the last.

articles.title: Meeting for Remembering Kim Jong Il Held in China
articles.content:
Meeting for Remembering Kim Jong Il Held in China
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- A meeting for remembering leader Kim Jong Il took place in China on Feb. 9 in commemoration of his 70th birth anniversary.
					Its participants watched videos introducing the DPRK such as "Pyongyang at Night" before speeches were made by Li Xiaohua, vice-president of China Association for International Friendly Contact, and Zhou Wei, daughter of Zhou Baozhong, a Chinese associated with the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle and other persons.
					
					Noting that Kim Jong Il's demise was a great loss to all the Korean people, Li said:
					
					Kim Jong Il carried forward and developed the traditional Sino-DPRK friendship provided and fostered by the elder revolutionaries of the two countries. The Chinese people will never forget him.
					
					Recollecting with deep emotion the warm loving care shown by Kim Jong Il for her family, Zhou Wei noted that Kim Jong Un identical to Kim Jong Il is showing profound love for families of those related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle. 
					
					No matter how much water may flow under the bridge and no matter how frequently a generation is replaced by another, the Sino-DPRK friendship will always be evergreen, Zhou Wei said, expressing confidence that the generations to come will also carry forward and  further glorify the bilateral friendly relations.
					
					The feats Kim Jong Il performed for boosting the bilateral relations of friendship will always shed its rays and go down in history, Zhou Wei concluded.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Italy
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Italy
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Juche Philosophy Is an Original Revolutionary Philosophy" was brought out in booklet by the Group of Dialectical Materialists of Italy on February 3.
					The work, published on July 26, Juche 85 (1996), clarifies the idea that the Juche philosophy is the original philosophy evolved and systematized with its intrinsic principles and a revolutionary and popular philosophy truly serving  the popular masses' struggle for independence.
					
					It also indicates the tasks to study, explain and disseminate the Juche philosophy as intended by the Party and fully apply it to revolutionary practice.

articles.title: Brief Biography of Kim Jong Il Posted on Internet Homepage
articles.content:
Brief Biography of Kim Jong Il Posted on Internet Homepage
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- The Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism posted the brief biography of leader Kim Jong Il on its Internet homepage on February 6.
					The homepage stressed that the cause of Kim Jong Il would be successfully carried forward by Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Workers' Party of Korea, state and army.

articles.title: Events to Mark Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il Held
articles.content:
Events to Mark Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il Held
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- Diverse events took place to commemorate the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il on Feb. 2 and 3. They include a meeting, remembrance meeting, photo exhibition, film show, etc., in Romania, Iran, Myanmar, Democratic Congo, Guinea and Uganda.
					Displayed in the venues were photos of the undying feats of Kim Jong Il.
					
					The participants of the film shows watched "Fireworks for a Thriving Nation" and other Korean films.
					
					The chairman of the Romanian Socialist Union said the life and exploits of Kim Jong Il who made undying contributions to the Korean revolution and global independence with his original Songun politics will always be remembered not only by the Korean people but by progressive humankind.
					
					The president of the International Taekwon-Do Association in Iran noted Kim Jong Il was a steadfast anti-imperialist fighter and defender of justice and truth and benevolent father of the people, adding that the tremendous national power of the DPRK today is attributable to his tested leadership.
					
					The general director for Administrative Affairs of the Union of Myanmar Economic Holdings Limited noted the revolutionary career and great exploits of Kim Jong Il would shine forever along with history, and humankind hold him in high esteem forever as a great leader.
					
					Nzemba Yangana, chairman of the Youth Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in Democratic Congo, said in a lecture titled "Brilliant Life of Leader Kim Jong Il" that such a great statesman and a benevolent father of people as Kim Jong Il can hardly be found anywhere else in the world.
					
					Banou Keita, chairman of the GuineaÔºçKorea Friendship Association, highly praised him as an illustrious thinker and theoretician recognized by the international community in a lecture under the title of "Kim Jong Il and His Outstanding Ideological and Theoretical Activities".
					
					The acting executive secretary of the Ugandan National Women's Council said the ceremony for bidding last farewell to Kim Jong Il showed to the world how single-mindedly the Korean people are united around him and how much he loved them.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Lauded by Papers of Mexico, Nepal
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Lauded by Papers of Mexico, Nepal
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- Papers of Mexico and Nepal carried special write-ups on Jan. 31 on the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					The Mexican paper Unidad Nacional devoted its one whole page to an article titled "Great Man Kim Jong Il" illustrated with his photo.
					
					The world community is praising him as a distinguished great man, the paper said.
					
					He dynamically aroused the people to carry out the socialist cause while always finding himself among them through his ceaseless field guidance, it noted.
					
					The Nepali paper Gorkha Express carried a photo of Kim Jong Il acknowledging the cheers of the crowd from the tribune of honor of Kim Il Sung Square.
					
					He regarded the single-minded unity as a mainstay of the revolution, consolidated as firm as a rock the single-minded unity of the society with the People' Army as the core under the banner of Songun and led the service personnel to make a breakthrough in socialist construction, the paper stressed.

articles.title: National Seminar Held to Commemorate Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
National Seminar Held to Commemorate Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- A national seminar for commemorating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il was held in Mexico City on Feb. 3.
					On display in the venue of the seminar were works of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and books introducing their feats.
					
					Present there were officials of the People's Socialist Party, the Democratic Revolutionary Party and the Socialist Popular Party of Mexico, the Mexican National Coordinating Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism, the Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea and other political parties and organizations and masses.
					
					The chairman of the Mexican National Coordinating Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea made a report at the seminar to be followed by speeches.
					
					The reporter and speakers pointed to the significance of the seminar and paid highest tribute to Kim Jong Il.
					
					They praised him as a distinguished thinker and theoretician, rare political elder and peerlessly Songun brilliant commander who led the revolutionary cause of Juche and the Songun revolutionary cause through his energetic ideological and theoretical activities and wise leadership.
					
					The world progressive people are waging a dynamic struggle for achieving the cause of independence against imperialism and building a new society, looking up to socialist Korea led by Kim Jong Il as a beacon of hope, they noted, referring to the more brisk activities for studying and disseminating the Juche idea and the Songun idea worldwide.
					
					They stressed that the Korean people would win shining victory in the struggle to build a thriving nation and reunify the country under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un, true to the behests of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Lauded by Peruvian Political Figure
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Lauded by Peruvian Political Figure
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- Genaro Ledesma Izquieta, chairman of the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru, issued a statement on Feb. 2 on the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					Kim Jong Il was a great thinker and theoretician, the chairman said, and went on:
					
					His undying feats are recorded in history and always remembered not only by the Korean people but by the world people aspiring after socialism.
					
					Many media of the world are giving publicity to his immortal famous works along with his portraits and widely introducing his greatness.
					
					Media are praising him as a world renowned great leader.
					
					The south Korean people, too, are speaking highly of the feats Kim Jong Il performed by conducting energetic activities for achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of the country divided by the U.S. imperialists.
					
					He formulated the Three Principles of National Reunification, the 10-Point Programme of the Great Unity of the Whole Nation and the Proposal for Founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo advanced by President Kim Il Sung as the Three Charters for National Reunification.
					
					He was the lodestar as he led the Korean people to victory.

articles.title: Floral Basket Sent to DPRK Embassy by Beninese Party Leader
articles.content:
Floral Basket Sent to DPRK Embassy by Beninese Party Leader
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- Ali Houdou, president of the Socialist Party of Benin, sent a floral basket to the DPRK embassy in his country on Feb. 3 on the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					He said:
					
					Kim Jong Il firmly defended Korean-style socialism, a beacon of hope for progressive mankind, from all the moves of the hostile forces and laid strong political, military and economic foundations of the DPRK, thus performing undying feats for its socialist cause and the global independence.
					
					President Kim Il Sung, the founding-father of socialist Korea, and Kim Jong Il, the defender of socialism and justice, will always live in minds of the world progressive people.
					
					I extend firm support and solidarity to the Korean people who are dynamically speeding up the general advance for carrying forward and accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche and building a thriving socialist nation, rallied close around the dear respected Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary to Be Commemorated in Egypt
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary to Be Commemorated in Egypt
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for commemorating the 70th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il was inaugurated in Cairo on Feb. 7.
					Hilmi Ahmad Salim, chairman of the Socialist Freedom Party of Egypt, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					The preparatory committee decided to organize a seminar on the feats of Kim Jong Il, meeting, photo exhibition, film show and other political and cultural events on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star.

articles.title: Russia Clarifies Its Stand to Create Aerospace Defense System
articles.content:
Russia Clarifies Its Stand to Create Aerospace Defense System
Moscow, February 10 (KCNA) -- Russian Deputy Prime Minister Dmitri Rogozin in his recent article posted on an Internet homepage clarified Russia's attitude to build a reliable aerospace defense system.
					He made the remark in response to the statement made by the secretary general of the NATO that it would steadily develop the missile defense system as it is fully aware of the important responsibility to protect the residents from the threat of missiles.
					
					He said that Russia is also aware of the responsibility to protect its residents from the threat of the NATO's missiles.

articles.title: Cooperation among Countries
articles.content:
Cooperation among Countries
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- China and Malaysia signed an agreement on strengthening bilateral relations in the field of finance on Feb. 8.
					Earlier on Feb. 7, Indonesia and Russia adopted a memorandum of understanding on building railway, under which Russia will help build a railway line in East Kalimantan of Indonesia.

articles.title: 10 Killed in U.S. Drone Strike in NW Pakistan
articles.content:
10 Killed in U.S. Drone Strike in NW Pakistan
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- The U.S. forces in Afghanistan continued to kill Pakistanis under the signboard of "anti-terrorism".
					At least 10 people were killed and two others injured when a U.S. drone launched two missile strikes in North Waziristan region of Pakistan's northwest tribal belt on Wednesday morning, local media reported.
					
					Anger against the U.S. drone strikes in the Waziristan tribal areas runs high in Pakistan because the attacks have killed hundreds of innocent people including women and kids since 2004.

articles.title: Yamaguchi Gov. against U.S. Proposal to Move 1 500 Okinawa Marines
articles.content:
Yamaguchi Gov. against U.S. Proposal to Move 1 500 Okinawa Marines
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- Sources close to Japan-U.S. relations said Monday that Washington has sounded out Tokyo on a plan to transfer the 1 500 Marines to Iwakuni, representing nearly half of the 3 300 Okinawa Marines. 
					Yamaguchi Gov. Sekinari Nii urged the central government on Tuesday to reject a reported U.S. proposal to move about 1 500 Marines from Okinawa Prefecture to the Iwakuni base in Yamaguchi.
					
					"This came out of the blue and I feel distrust against the (central) government. I want it to reject the proposal," Nii told reporters.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe carta de Alejandro Cao de Benos
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe carta de Alejandro Cao de Benos
Pyongyang, 11 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un recibio una carta que le enviara el 28 de enero el presidente de la Asociacion de Amistad con Corea, Alejandro Cao de Benos, con motivo de la Conferencia Internacional via Internet. 
					La misiva va como sigue: 
					
					Su Excelencia mas respetado Kim Jong Un,
					
					El Comite Preparatorio Internacional para el Centenario de Natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung y la Asociacion de Amistad con Corea organizaron desde el 24 de diciembre del 100 (2011) de la Era Juche la seminario internacional via Internet bajo el tema de "El gran Dirigente, camarada Kim Jong Il vive siempre en nosotros" para dar a conocer a todo el mundo la vida inmortal y las actividades revolucionarias del Dirigente y sus esfuerzos abnegados por llevar a la realidad el anhelo del Presidente Kim Il Sung. 
					
					Hasta la fecha, por lo menos 26 millones 500 mil usurarios del mundo vieron las fotos alusivas a las proezas revolucionarias del Dirigente, las canciones y los discursos de elogio a sus hazanas. 
					
					Los participantes en el seminario expresaron unanimemente sus deseos de erguir la estatua de bronce de Kim Jong Il en la colina Mansu en Pyongyang donde esta erguida la estatua de bronce de Kim Il Sung. 
					
					La imagen de Kim Jong Un visitando la Escuela Revolucionaria de Mangyongdae estimulo mucho a nosotros que luchamos por defender y glorificar la patria del Juche. 
					
					Le deseo a Vd. buena salud. 
					
					!Viva Su Excelencia General Kim Jong Un!

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe Premio de Periodista de Paz de 2012 de Nepal
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe Premio de Periodista de Paz de 2012 de Nepal
Pyongyang, 11 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Club Nacional de Periodistas de Nepal y el Forum de Estudio de la Politica de Songun del mismo club dedicaron al Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un el Premio de Periodista de Paz de Nepal de 2012, tras registrarle como miembro honorario del club.
					Tuvo lugar el dia 6 la ceremonia de entrega del premio y el diploma.
					
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes el ministro del Estado de Informacion y Comunicacion, el secretario general del Comite Central del Partido Comunista Nepales (Marxista-Leninista) quien es el presidente del comite preparatorio nacional de Nepal por el 70o aniversario de natalicio del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, el presidente de susodicho Forum y las personalidades del gobierno, partidos politicos y entidades, asi como los habitantes.
					
					Fueron invitados el embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario y otros miembros de la embajada coreana acreditada en Nepal.
					
					El premio y el diploma se entregaron al embajador coreano.
					
					El presidente de forum Ram K. Karmacharya dijo que registrar como miembro honorario y dedicar ese premio a Su Excelencia Kim Jong Un en ocasion del Dia de la Estrella Luz (16 de febrero, dia de nacimiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il) son la unanime voluntad y maximo honor para los hombres progresistas de prensa de Nepal y el mundo.

articles.title: Premier coreano averigua estado de produccion de energia electrica
articles.content:
Premier coreano averigua estado de produccion de energia electrica
Pyongyang, 11 de febrero (ACNC) -- El premier coreano Choe Yong Rim averiguo el dia 10 en el terreno el estado de la produccion de energia electrica y de la gestion de caldera y generador de turbina en el Complejo Termoelectrico de Pyongyang.
					Tras recorrer varios lugares del Complejo, Choe convoco una reunion de consulta de los funcionarios correspondientes.
					
					En la reunion se debatieron los temas de trabajo para establecer bien el plan de produccion y suministracion de energia electrica, controlar estrictamente el consumo electrico, arreglar y mejorar el sistema de suministracion electrica.
					
					Ademas se adoptaron las medidas para asegurar suficientemente la gestion normal de la central y las materias primas para la reparacion de caldera y que las unidades concernientes produzcan los accesorios en cooperacion y se los envien a tiempo.

articles.title: Proyectado documental "Para llevar a la realidad el anhelo del Lider"
articles.content:
Proyectado documental "Para llevar a la realidad el anhelo del Lider"
Pyongyang, 11 de febrero (ACNC) -- Con motivo del Dia de la Estrella Luz (16 de febrero, cumpleanos del Dirigente Kim Jong Il), se proyecto el dia 11 en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo la pelicula documental "Para llevar a la realidad el anhelo del Lider". 
					Lo vieron Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim y otros cuadros del partido y el Estado, los funcionarios de ministerios y organos centrales. 
					
					La pelicula muestra en cuadros historicos los abnegados esfuerzos del Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien dedico todo lo suyo por realizar el ideal del Presidente Kim Il Sung en materia de la construccion de la gran potencia prospera. 
					
					La pelicula alaba las imborrables proezas de direccion del Dirigente quien despues del fallecimiento del Presidente infundio en el corazon de los militares y civiles coreanos la ferrea conviccion de que "El Presidente Kim Il Sung vive siempre en nosotros" y elevo al maximo la dignidad y el poderio estatal de la Corea del Songun con la voluntad de acero y las actividades energicas sobrehumanas. 
					
					Los espectadores sintieron mas profundamente que el Dirigente, quien durante toda su vida estuvo en el incansable camino de orientacion, fue el destacado General Insigne del Songun, patriota sin igual y padre generoso del pueblo.

articles.title: ACNC critica a Chosun Ilbo por calumniar a la Orquesta Unhasu
articles.content:
ACNC critica a Chosun Ilbo por calumniar a la Orquesta Unhasu
Pyongyang, 11 de febrero (ACNC) -- El periodico venal surcoreano Chosun Ilbo, que no puede comprender el arte masivo de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, maldijo esta vez la gira regional de la Orquesta Unhasu, una de las entidades artisticas sobresalientes de Corea.
					Se hizo eco de la chismografia de la Radio Asia Libre, que se dedica a la demagogia anti-RPDC, tales como "los habitantes no le dan bienvenida a la orquesta" y "esta no da alegria a los habitantes locales sino les molesta".
					
					Esto es una informacion intrigante de los que intentan socavar la unidad monolitica entre el partido y el pueblo de la RPDC.
					
					La justa lucha revolucionaria del pueblo coreano de mas de 80 anos ha sido iniciada, avanzada y triunfada con las canciones.
					
					La revolucion coreana y el pueblo de la RPDC levantaron en los periodos mas arduos conocidos como la marcha penosa, la forzada, la consigna de fe y optimismo "!Aunque el camino es duro, vamos sonriendo!".
					
					En este trayecto brillante, la cancion y el arte de Corea sirven al pueblo coreano revolucionario de valioso alimento ideo-espiritual que no se puede cambiar con decenas de millones de toneladas de cereales.
					
					A pesar de que perdio al Padre de la nacion en que confiaba su destino, el pueblo coreano recobra ahora tambien las fuerzas y el coraje mil veces mas grandes escuchando las canciones de Unhasu que dieron la senal de inicio de la gran marcha del Ano Nuevo.
					
					 Por doquier del pais, esa banda sembro en el corazon de los habitantes la anoranza al Dirigente e hizo mas fuerte la unidad entre el y el pueblo produciendo grandes repercusiones.
					
					El ejercito y el pueblo cantaron entre lagrimas junto con la orquesta y se levantaron con las canciones.  
					
					Los chismes de la Radio Asia Libre y Chosun Ilbo no pasan de ser un gemido de los atemorizados ante el poderio del arte coreano y la oleada de Unhasu, mas temibles que la bomba nuclear. 
					
					Los miembros de ese periodico venal, convertido en el mestizo de la cultura yanqui y la japonesa, no comprenderan nunca el verdadero valor de nuestro arte. 
					
					Supimos esta vez la concepcion de arte de ellos que vieron con la logica de negociante la gira regional de Unhasu diciendo que esta no tuvo ganancias financieras.
					
					Detras de tal demagogia estan la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak y el Servicio Nacional de Inteligencia del Sur de Corea.
					
					Ellos no podran corroer de ninguna manera la unidad monolitica de la RPDC.
					
					Es tan miserable la camarilla de Lee Myung Bak que trata de mantener su precaria vida politica con la confrontacion fratricida.
